attributes.action: Require all hospitals  in England to perform operations at the weekend
attributes.additional_details: This would make best use of available resources, help clear waiting lists and reduce waste.  It would also encourage transparency and provide accountability in the use of taxpayers’ money.
attributes.background: I would like the government to enact legislation that requires hospital management, under NHS England, to improve efficiency by organising staff rotas to perform operations at the weekend.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is an operational decision for the NHS and individual trusts.
